title: Holy Office Familiar
common: List of people accepted to be Holy Office Familiar, because they had "clean blood", or rejected people, because their ancestors were from countries not Christian.

This special section was made, because these diligences have investigation through different generations. It is also observed that some researchers are extracting texts from their context, or never cite documents like this.

value.name: Pedro Dias Paes (Leme)
value.desc: was accepted as Familiar after a deep investigation that cites five generations of his family. During the Paulista civil war, three generations of his family received defamation like Jewish person, but witnesses, and documents prove that he did not have Jewish ancestors [known].

value.name: Garcia Roiz Paes Leme
value.desc: had a simpler investigation, because an uncle and a cousin were previously accepted to be Familiar.
